commits.sourceOld:
/** * Construct a new ICUTokenizer that breaks text into words from the given * Reader. *

* The default script-specific handling is used. *

* The default attribute factory is used. * * @param input Reader containing text to tokenize. * @see DefaultICUTokenizerConfig */ public ICUTokenizer(Reader input) { this(input, new DefaultICUTokenizerConfig(true)); }
